statements: SELECT * FROM DronesData;
SELECT media_type, drone_id FROM DronesData ORDER BY drone_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM DronesData WHERE media_type = 'photo';
SELECT drone_id, capture_time FROM DronesData WHERE drone_id < 100;
SELECT drone_id, media_type FROM DronesData WHERE media_type IN ('photo', 'video') ORDER BY capture_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM DronesData WHERE drone_id = 1;
SELECT drone_id, media_type FROM DronesData WHERE media_type = 'photo' ORDER BY capture_time DESC;
SELECT drone_id, media_type, capture_time FROM DronesData WHERE capture_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01' ORDER BY capture_time ASC;
SELECT COUNT(drone_id) AS total_drones, media_type FROM DronesData GROUP BY media_type HAVING COUNT(drone_id) > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT media_type FROM DronesData ORDER BY media_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM images;
SELECT image_title, image_description FROM images WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT video_title FROM videos WHERE video_duration > 60;
SELECT image_title, image_description FROM images WHERE image_title LIKE '%nature%';
SELECT * FROM videos ORDER BY video_duration DESC;
SELECT image_title, image_path FROM images WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE image_id > 10 ORDER BY image_title DESC;
SELECT video_title, video_path FROM videos WHERE video_duration > 300 ORDER BY video_title ASC;
SELECT image_title, image_description, image_path FROM images WHERE image_id IN (2, 5, 8);
SELECT image_title, video_title FROM images JOIN videos ON images.image_id = videos.video_id WHERE images.image_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE drone_id = 1;
SELECT video_id, drone_id, capture_timestamp FROM videos WHERE drone_id = 2 ORDER BY capture_timestamp DESC;
SELECT drone_name, manufacturer FROM drones WHERE capture_resolution = '4K';
SELECT image_id, drone_id, capture_timestamp FROM images WHERE image_id < 10 AND drone_id >= 5;
SELECT AVG(drone_id) AS average_drone_id FROM drones;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE drone_id = 1;
SELECT image_id, capture_timestamp FROM images WHERE capture_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT drone_name, manufacturer FROM drones WHERE drone_id = 3;
SELECT image_id, drone_id FROM images ORDER BY drone_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE drone_id = 2 AND capture_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM drones_images;
SELECT image_name, image_description FROM drones_images WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT image_name, image_timestamp FROM drones_images ORDER BY image_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM drones_videos WHERE video_id = 3;
SELECT video_name, video_url FROM drones_videos WHERE video_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM drones_images WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT image_name, image_url FROM drones_images WHERE image_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT image_name, image_description FROM drones_images ORDER BY image_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM drones_videos WHERE video_id > 5 ORDER BY video_timestamp ASC;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM drone_locations WHERE drone_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE inspector_id = '12345';
SELECT image_id, drone_id, location FROM images WHERE drone_id = '67890';
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE capture_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT drone_id, drone_model, manufacturer FROM drones ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT inspector_id, name, email, phone_number FROM inspectors WHERE inspector_id = '54321';
SELECT * FROM images LIMIT 10;
SELECT image_id, drone_id, capture_timestamp FROM images WHERE inspector_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT video_id, video_data, location FROM videos WHERE location IS NOT NULL ORDER BY capture_timestamp DESC;
SELECT inspector_id, name, email, phone_number FROM inspectors WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT drone_id, drone_model, manufacturer, battery_level FROM drones WHERE manufacturer = 'DJI' ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
